00017 void CSMAMacLayer::initialize(int stage)
00018 {
00019     BaseMacLayer::initialize(stage);
00020 
00021     if (stage == 0) {
00022 
00023         queueLength = hasPar("queueLength")   ? par("queueLength").longValue()   : 10;
00024         //busyRSSI = hasPar("busyRSSI")       ? par("busyRSSI").doubleValue()    : -90;
00025         slotDuration = hasPar("slotDuration")   ? par("slotDuration").doubleValue()  : 0.1;
00026         difs = hasPar("difs")           ? par("difs").doubleValue()      : 0.001;
00027         maxTxAttempts = hasPar("maxTxAttempts") ? par("maxTxAttempts").longValue()   : 7;
00028         bitrate = hasPar("bitrate")       ? par("bitrate").doubleValue()     : 10000;
00029         txPower = hasPar("txPower")       ? par("txPower").doubleValue()     : 50;
00030         initialCW = hasPar("contentionWindow")  ? par("contentionWindow").longValue(): 31;
00031 
00032         macState = RX;
00033 
00034         //droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::NONE);
00035 
00036         //nicId = getParentModule()->getId();
00037 
00038         // initialize the timer
00039         backoffTimer = new cMessage("backoff");
00040         minorMsg = new cMessage("minClear");
00041 
00042         nbBackoffs = 0;
00043     backoffValues = 0;
00044     nbTxFrames = 0;
00045 
00046         txAttempts = 0;
00047     }
00048     else if(stage == 1) {
00049       BaseConnectionManager* cc = getConnectionManager();
00050 
00051       if(cc->hasPar("pMax") && txPower > cc->par("pMax").doubleValue())
00052             opp_error("TranmitterPower can't be bigger than pMax in ConnectionManager! "
00053                   "Please adjust your omnetpp.ini file accordingly.");
00054 
00055       if(phy->getRadioState() != Radio::RX) {
00056         opp_error("Initial radio state isn't RX but CSMAMacLayer"
00057               " assumes that the NIC starts in RX state.");
00058       }
00059 
00060       debugEV << "queueLength = " << queueLength
00061            //<< " busyRSSI = " << busyRSSI
00062            << " slotDuration = " << slotDuration
00063            << " difs = " << difs
00064            << " maxTxAttempts = " << maxTxAttempts
00065            << " bitrate = " << bitrate
00066            << " contentionWindow = " << initialCW << endl;
00067 
00068         //busyRSSI = FWMath::dBm2mW(busyRSSI);
00069     }
00070 }

00072 CSMAMacLayer::~CSMAMacLayer() {
00073   cancelAndDelete(backoffTimer);
00074   cancelAndDelete(minorMsg);
00075 
00076     for(MacQueue::iterator it = macQueue.begin();
00077     it != macQueue.end(); ++it)
00078     {
00079         delete (*it);
00080     }
00081     macQueue.clear();
00082 }

00084 void CSMAMacLayer::finish() {
00085   recordScalar("nbBackoffs", nbBackoffs);
00086   recordScalar("backoffDurations", backoffValues);
00087   recordScalar("nbTxFrames", nbTxFrames);
00088 
00089 
00090 }

00105 void CSMAMacLayer::handleUpperMsg(cMessage *msg)
00106 {
00107   cPacket* pkt = static_cast<cPacket*>(msg);
00108 
00109     //MacPkt *mac = encapsMsg(pkt);
00110 
00111     // message has to be queued if another message is waiting to be send
00112     // or if we are already trying to send another message
00113 
00114     if (macQueue.size() <= queueLength)
00115     {
00116         macQueue.push_back(pkt);
00117         debugEV   << "packet putt in queue\n  queue size:" << macQueue.size() << " macState:" << macState
00118       << " (RX=" << RX << ") is scheduled:" << backoffTimer->isScheduled() << endl;;
00119 
00120         if((macQueue.size() == 1) && (macState == RX) && !backoffTimer->isScheduled()) {
00121             scheduleBackoff();
00122         }
00123     }
00124     else {
00125         // queue is full, message has to be deleted
00126       EV << "New packet arrived, but queue is FULL, so new packet is deleted\n";
00127         MacPkt* mac = encapsMsg(pkt);
00128         mac->setName("MAC ERROR");
00129         mac->setKind(PACKET_DROPPED);
00130         sendControlUp(mac);
00131 
00132         //TODO: send packet drop bb info
00133         //droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::QUEUE);
00134         //emitItem(catDroppedPacket, &droppedPacket);
00135     }
00136 }

00142 void CSMAMacLayer::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg)
00143 {
00144     if(msg == backoffTimer) {
00145       debugEV << "backoffTimer ";
00146 
00147         if(macState == RX) {
00148           debugEV << " RX ";
00149 
00150             if(macQueue.size() != 0) {
00151               macState = CCA;
00152 
00153                 if(phy->getRadioState() == Radio::RX) {
00154 
00155                     if(phy->getChannelState().isIdle()) {
00156                       debugEV << " idle ";
00157                         scheduleAt(simTime()+difs, minorMsg);
00158                     }
00159                     else{
00160                       macState = RX;
00161                       debugEV << " busy ";
00162                         scheduleBackoff();
00163                     }
00164                 }
00165             }
00166         }
00167         else {
00168           debugEV << "" << endl;
00169           debugEV << "state=" << macState << "(TX="<<TX<<", CCA="<<CCA<<")\n";
00170             error("backoffTimer expired, MAC in wrong state");
00171         }
00172     }
00173     else if(msg == minorMsg) {
00174       debugEV << " minorMsg ";
00175 
00176         //TODO: replace with channel sense request
00177         if((macState == CCA) && (phy->getRadioState() == Radio::RX)) {
00178 
00179             if(phy->getChannelState().isIdle()) {
00180               debugEV << " idle -> to send ";
00181                 macState = TX;
00182                 phy->setRadioState(Radio::TX);
00183             }
00184             else {
00185               debugEV << " busy -> backoff ";
00186                 macState = RX;
00187                 if(!backoffTimer->isScheduled())
00188                   scheduleBackoff();
00189             }
00190         }
00191         else {
00192             error("minClearTimer fired -- channel or mac in wrong state");
00193         }
00194     }
00195     debugEV << endl;
00196 }

00204 void CSMAMacLayer::handleLowerMsg(cMessage *msg)
00205 {
00206     MacPkt*                 mac  = static_cast<MacPkt *>(msg);
00207     const LAddress::L2Type& dest = mac->getDestAddr();
00208 
00209     if(dest == myMacAddr || LAddress::isL2Broadcast(dest))
00210     {
00211       debugEV << "sending pkt to upper...\n";
00212         sendUp(decapsMsg(mac));
00213     }
00214     else {
00215       debugEV << "packet not for me, deleting...\n";
00216         delete mac;
00217     }
00218 
00219     if(!backoffTimer->isScheduled()) scheduleBackoff();
00220 }
00221 
00222 void CSMAMacLayer::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg)
00223 {
00224     if(msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::TX_OVER) {
00225       debugEV << " transmission over" << endl;
00226         macState = RX;
00227         phy->setRadioState(Radio::RX);
00228         txAttempts = 0;
00229         if(!backoffTimer->isScheduled()) scheduleBackoff();
00230     }
00231     else if(msg->getKind() == MacToPhyInterface::RADIO_SWITCHING_OVER) {
00232       if((macState == TX) && (phy->getRadioState() == Radio::TX)) {
00233         debugEV << " radio switched to tx, sendDown packet" << endl;
00234             nbTxFrames++;
00235             sendDown(encapsMsg(macQueue.front()));
00236             macQueue.pop_front();
00237         }
00238     }
00239     else {
00240       EV << "control message with wrong kind -- deleting\n";
00241     }
00242     delete msg;
00243 }
00244 
00245 void CSMAMacLayer::scheduleBackoff()
00246 {
00247     if(backoffTimer->isScheduled()) {
00248         std::cerr << " is scheduled: MAC state "
00249                   << macState << " radio state : " << phy->getRadioState() << endl;
00250     }
00251 
00252     if(minorMsg->isScheduled()){
00253     cancelEvent( minorMsg );
00254     macState=RX;
00255   }
00256 
00257     if(txAttempts > maxTxAttempts) {
00258       debugEV << " drop packet " << endl;
00259 
00260         cMessage *mac = encapsMsg(macQueue.front());
00261         mac->setName("MAC ERROR");
00262         mac->setKind(PACKET_DROPPED);
00263         txAttempts = 0;
00264         macQueue.pop_front();
00265         sendControlUp(mac);
00266 
00267         //TODO: send packet drop bb info
00268         //droppedPacket.setReason(DroppedPacket::CHANNEL);
00269         //emit(catDroppedPacket, &droppedPacket);
00270     }
00271 
00272     if(macQueue.size() != 0) {
00273       debugEV << " schedule backoff " << endl;
00274 
00275         double slots = intrand(initialCW + txAttempts) + 1.0 + dblrand();
00276         double time = slots * slotDuration;
00277 
00278         txAttempts++;
00279         debugEV << " attempts so far: " << txAttempts  << " " << endl;
00280 
00281     nbBackoffs = nbBackoffs + 1;
00282     backoffValues = backoffValues + time;
00283 
00284         scheduleAt(simTime() + time, backoffTimer);
00285     }
00286 
00287 }
00288 
00289 MacPkt* CSMAMacLayer::encapsMsg(cPacket *pkt)
00290 {
00291   MacPkt* macPkt = BaseMacLayer::encapsMsg(pkt);
00292 
00293   //calc signal duration
00294   simtime_t duration = macPkt->getBitLength() / bitrate;
00295 
00296   if(duration > slotDuration) {
00297     EV << "Warning: Sending packet " << pkt
00298        << " - duration (" << duration
00299        << " ) is bigger than the slot duration (" << slotDuration
00300        <<")." << endl;
00301   }
00302 
00303   //create signal
00304   setDownControlInfo(macPkt, createSignal(simTime(), duration, txPower, bitrate));
00305 
00306   return macPkt;
00307 }
